original_title: Triads, Yardies & Onion Bhajees! Once Upon A Time In Southall
overview: Welcome to London, home of many creeds and cultures. West London is ruled by the Holy Smokes crime syndicate. North London is the territory of the Triads. South London is governed by the Jamaican mafia, the Yardies. East London is home to the original Anglo-Saxon cockney gangsters, The Firm. It's a roller-coaster ride as the crime syndicates battle to see who rules London!
title: Triads, Yardies & Onion Bhajees! Once Upon A Time In Southall
